attributes.action: To Ban car clamping and make it illegial like the Scottish goverment have done
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Goverment in Scotland have banned clamping on private land as it resorts to theft  I want the UK government to ban clamping on private land like the Scottish have seems the Scottish bring in all the new laws but our government can't

If not the government need to bring in rules for clamping and regulate all clampers and bring in set fees for what they can charge to release your car
